vclaim: In January 2021, Juli Briskman, a Democrat from Virginia who once flipped off President Donald Trump's motorcade, was elected to office in a jurisdiction where one of his golf clubs is located.
title: Did Juli Briskman Lose Her Job After Flipping Off Trump, Then Get Elected in County Home to His Golf Club?
subtitle: One of Trump's golf clubs is reportedly located in the county where Juli Briskman now holds an elected seat.
author: Madison Dapcevich
